name: SmolOnes
description:
A 2.1-768 model that specializes in making baby versions of characters. All the pictures used as examples were generated with the prompt format
*Angle* shot of (SmolOne:1.2) baby *character*, tiny *character*, intricate, highly detailed, digital painting, artstation, matte, sharp

Tested mainly with the above prompt, the important thing is the SmolOne token from slight testing in other prompt formats.

Training images were scraped from @tophmagoph_ on instagram. An artist who makes similar images using midjourney AI.

Poorly captioned training images are attached for any use.

There is a TI that goes well and was trained on this model called SmolGuys

Example pictures include, in this order
1. Daredevil
2. Wonder Woman
3. One Punch Man
4. Naruto
5. Emma Watson
6. Afro Samurai
7. Elsa
8. Rick Sanchez
9. Ratchet
10. Rick Ross
11. Loki

meta.prompt: A (SmolOne:1.2), baby Daredevil, cinematic quality, dynamic lighting, octane render, in the style of (SmolGuys:0.6)
